name: gpw_v4_rev11_density
title: Population Density (GPW V4.11, UN Adjusted)
description: Population density (UN Adjusted values) from Gridded Population of the World v4 revision 11. GPWv4 depicts the density of human population across the globe. Source data provided in 30 arc-second (~1 km) grid cells.
details: No additional processing of raw data.

extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: average population density per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.max: maximum population density per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum population density per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Center for International Earth Science Information Network - CIESIN - Columbia University. 2018. Gridded Population of the World, Version 4 (GPWv4): Population Density Adjusted to Match 2015 Revision UN WPP Country Totals, Revision 11. Palisades, NY: NASA Socioeconomic Data and Applications Center (SEDAC). https://doi.org/10.7927/H4F47M65. Accessed 13 July 2021
